title: History Extra podcast - August 2009 - Part 2
itunes:title: History Extra podcast - August 2009 - Part 2
itunes:subtitle: Peter Thompson explains how a 17th-century shipwreck brought Bermuda into the British Empire; Sean McGlynn discusses Medieval atrocities and reveals how they compare to modern-day brutality.
description:
Peter Thompson explains how a 17th-century shipwreck brought Bermuda into the British Empire; Sean McGlynn discusses Medieval atrocities and reveals how they compare to modern-day brutality.

Hosted on Acast. See acast.com/privacy for more information.
